text: The Money Habit is a 1924 British silent crime film directed by Walter Niebuhr and starring Clive Brook, Annette Benson and Nina Vanna.Low p.411 It was based on a novel by Paul M. Potter. The screenplay concerns a man whose mistress helps him con a financier into buying a worthless oil well. ==Cast== * Clive Brook as Noel Jason * Annette Benson as Diana Hastings * Nina Vanna as Cecile d'Arcy * Warwick Ward as Varian * Fred Rains as Marley * Eva Westlake as Duchess * Philip Hewland as Mr. Hastings * Muriel Gregory as Typist * Kate Gurney as Mrs. Hastings ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. History of the British Film, 1918-1929. George Allen & Unwin, 1971. ==External links== * Category:1924 films Category:1924 crime films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British crime films Category:English-language films Category:Films based on British novels Category:British black-and-white films
title: The Money Habit
